code: import{removeAlert,setAlert}from"../redux/action/alert";import store from"../redux/store";export var AlertHelper=function AlertHelper(_ref){var msg=_ref.msg,alertType=_ref.alertType;var id=Math.floor(Math.random()*100000);store.dispatch(setAlert({id:id,msg:msg,alertType:alertType}));setTimeout(function(){store.dispatch(removeAlert(id));},4000);};
